summary: Comprehensive testing of new features: Product Reviews & Ratings, Related Products, and Email Notifications (MOCKED). All backend APIs working correctly (100% pass rate). Frontend UI features verified and working.
passed_tests: Backend API - 100% success rate (20/20 tests passed)
GET /api/reviews/{product_id} - Returns reviews with stats, average rating, rating breakdown
GET /api/reviews/{product_id} - Returns empty for nonexistent product
POST /api/reviews - Creates new review successfully
POST /api/reviews - Blocks duplicate reviews from same user
POST /api/reviews - Validates rating (1-5 range)
POST /api/reviews - Returns 404 for nonexistent product
DELETE /api/reviews/{id} - Deletes own review successfully
DELETE /api/reviews/{id} - Blocks unauthorized deletion
GET /api/products/{id}/related - Returns related products by category/brand
GET /api/products/{id}/related?limit=4 - Respects limit parameter
GET /api/products/{id}/related - Returns 404 for nonexistent product
Related products share category OR brand with original product
POST /api/orders/{id}/send-confirmation - Sends email (MOCKED)
POST /api/orders/{id}/send-confirmation - Returns 404 for nonexistent order
POST /api/test-email - Test email endpoint works (MOCKED)
Frontend - Product detail page loads with star rating at top
Frontend - Rating breakdown chart displays correctly
Frontend - Review list shows user name, date, stars, title, comment
Frontend - Write Review button visible only for logged-in users
Frontend - Review form with star rating selector, title, comment inputs
Frontend - Related products section shows 4 products from same category/brand
Frontend - Login flow works correctly

success_rate.frontend: 100% (All review and related product features working)

seed_data_creation: Test reviews created with TEST_ prefix for car-remote-1 product
context_for_next_testing_agent: New features tested: 1) Product Reviews API with CRUD operations, duplicate prevention, rating validation. 2) Related Products API returning products by same category/brand. 3) Email Notifications API (MOCKED - Resend API key not configured). Frontend shows star ratings, rating breakdown chart, review list, review form for logged-in users, and related products section. Test credentials: admin@allremotes.com.au / admin123

mocked_apis.email_notifications: Email notifications are MOCKED (Resend API key not configured). Emails are logged to console instead of being sent. Returns {status: 'mocked', message: 'Email logged (Resend not configured)'}
